Server.Name: War of the Walkers v7 Stable
Server.Description: The War of the Walkers 7.x - Stable Branch Latest Stable Version of the War of the Walkers Mod. Release Notes Link will take you to the official discord for the mod. For those who would like to donate here is the link: https://www.paypal.me/dwallorde 7DTD Version Required: 18.4 Stable. Current Mod Version: 7.0.7

Server.Name: War of the Walkers v7 Exp
Server.Description: The War of the Walkers 7.x - Experimental (Warning! May contain game breaking bugs!) Latest Experimental Version of the War of the Walkers Mod. Release Notes Link will take you to the official discord for the mod. For those who would like to donate here is the link: https://www.paypal.me/dwallorde Contains the following modlets: -0-CreaturePackAnimals -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackFantasy -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackHumans -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackMechs -Author: Xyth Community Project -0-CreaturePackZombies -Author: Xyth Community Project -CCTV -Author: Xyth -NerdScurvy_Toybox -Author: NerdScurvy -SMXhud -Author: Sirillion -SMXmenu -Author: Sirillion -SMXui -Author: Sirillion -SMXuiBBM -Author: Sirillion -War3zuk HD Guns/Ammo -Author: War3zuk 7DTD Version Required: 18.4 Stable. Current Mod Version: 7.1.4
